results.title: Fitness leader weight training encyclopaedia
results.creator_credit: Australian Council for Health, Physical Education and Recreation
results.brief_description: Presents a range of weight training exercises for different parts of the body. Indicates exercises that develop muscular strength and endurance, muscular size and definition and aerobic fitness.

results.title: Fitness leader stretching encyclopaedia
results.creator_credit: Australian Council for Health, Physical Education and Recreation
results.brief_description: Presents a set of stretching exercises designed for different parts of the body. Emphasizes the importance of isometric contraction and motion stretching for flexibility of muscles and connective tissue.

results.title: Fitness leader exercise encyclopaedia
results.creator_credit: Bill Edmonds and Australian Council for Health, Physical Education and Recreation
results.brief_description: Designed for trainers, coaches, physical educators and other fitness leaders. Shows over one hundred exercises and sequences and explanations of correct and incorrect techniques. All exercises and sequences are numbered for quick and easy references and grouped for major muscle groups.

results.title: Fitness for Tennis - Stan Nicholes
results.brief_description: Hosted by Australia’s international tennis champion, Tony Roche (the man responsible for coaching Ivan Lendl on the restructuring of his game), this unique video gathers together some of the world’s tennis greats: Ivan Lendl, Martina Navratilova, Bjorn Borg, John McEnroe, Ken Rosewall, Pam Shriver, and others.

results.title: Fitness for living: how to get fit
results.creator_credit: Eric Horter and Walt Disney Educational Media Company
results.brief_description: This film shows ways of getting fit and suggests that regular practice of specific exercises is the key to developing strength and endurance; that slow continuous exercise such as jogging or bicycling develops the heart and lungs; that weight training augments muscle strength. Suitable for secondary level.

results.title: Fit to fight
results.creator_credit: Gordon Stewart, Ronald H. Riley, Army Kinema Corporation and R.H.R. Productions
results.brief_description: The physical training of the British Army, showing how it is carefully planned to help every recruit to reach his own individual peak of fitness. Explains the necessity for this high standard of physical well-being by showing how the training relates to different activities in the field.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gordon Stewart, Ronald H. Riley, Army Kinema Corporation and R.H.R. Productions

results.title: Fit For A King
results.brief_description: Marry everything. Execute everything. SPEND IT ALL. Live the ultimate fantasy in this Henry VIII simulator, and humiliate France with your wealth and excess, or die trying. Who’s going to stop you? God? Nope. You’re also the Pope.

constellations_other.name: Royals
constellations_other.description: Royal watchers don't need to visit palaces around the world. There are enough stories about royalty on the silver and small screen to get their fix.

results.description:
England, 1520. As the king or queen of this nation, you’ve been challenged to out-spend your rival, King Frank, at the Field of the Cloth of Gold. With the help of your staff and sycophants, you might be able to do it. Except you’ve misplaced your gold all over the castle… time to find all those chests and collect all those taxes!

Maybe you’ll bankrupt the country, but at least you’ll have a good time doing it.
description_for_label:
England, 1520. As the king or queen of this nation, you’ve been challenged to out-spend your rival, King Frank, at the Field of the Cloth of Gold. With the help of your staff and sycophants, you might be able to do it. Except you’ve misplaced your gold all over the castle… time to find all those chests and collect all those taxes!

Maybe you’ll bankrupt the country, but at least you’ll have a good time doing it.

results.title: Fists in the pocket = I pugni in tasca
results.creator_credit: Marco Bellocchio, Enzo Doria and Doria Film
results.brief_description: This bizarre drama chronicles the strange activities of a blind widow living with her four children - Augusto, Sandro, Leone and Giulia. The burden of supporting the family falls on Augusto, the only one of the four not afflicted with epilepsy. When Sandro determines to help Augusto break away and marry his girlfriend, he can see only one way to do it; and sets out to kill the rest of his family. Accompanied by a powerful film score by Ennio Morricone. In Italian with English subtitles.

results.title: Fishtank
results.creator_credit: Denis Quinn, Marie-Louise Simpson, Queensland University of Technology and Super Fresh Oyster Films
results.brief_description: An adult reflects on a time in his youth when he used to wait for his father at the Regatta Hotel in Queensland during the sixties. It was a time when the muffled mutterings at the bar concerned issues such as women, pictures, and what it meant to be part of the “lucky country”. It was a men’s club, one legally and morally off limits to women, until 2 of them enter the bar, and, after being evicted handcuff themselves to the bar as a form of protest. Based on a true event and narrated by Daniel Rowan. Cast includes Dave Robinson, Damien Donowan, Stephen Collins, Liesel Badorrek and Kyrra Mickelborough.
